title: Old Mill Tommy Leach and Cy Seymour
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Old Mill Tommy Leach and Cy Seymour
posts.post_content:
Two very good major leaguers with Old Mill backs

Seymour led the league in HITS, DOUBLES, TRIPLES, and RBI in 2005, and finished his 16 year career with a .303 average

Leach had a 19 year career and finished in the top 10 in the NL in offensive player WAR 4 times.

Seymour $20. SOLD

Leach $20.  SOLD

shipping $1 

Thank you for looking!

[quote name="frankbmd" post=1348241]2005?   Really!!![/QUOTE]

I KNEW SOMEONE WOULD SEE IT!! :eek:
I was only off by 100 years.   That's not that bad.  In the meantime,  the cards have sold.   If the buyer feels deceived in any way, I'm happy to issue a full refund :D
dang... nice cards, sorry i missed that Leach
